name: Desta: The Memories Between (Dream Team Edition)
name_original: Desta: The Memories Between (Dream Team Edition)
description:
From the creators of Monument Valley, Desta: The Memories Between is a heartfelt strategy game where you fall into a mysterious dreamworld. Grab your emotionally-charged ball, track your opponent's strategy and work tactically with your ultimate dream-team to throw the best shot and get to the heart of the conversation.

Desta: The Memories Between combines ustwo games’ approach to character storytelling with distinctive team-based tactics and physics gameplay, featuring strategic chess-like play with perfect physics precision.

Dream Team Edition is the digital collector’s edition of the narrative tactics game - compiling all major content updates together, including all characters, new game modes (including Challenge Mode and Nightmare Mode), as well a complete game soundtrack composed by acclaimed UK Artist Mansur Brown and a beautiful Digital Art Book! This is the ultimate bundle for fans of ustwo games!



FALL INTO DREAMS

  • Every night, Desta falls into the mysterious dreamworld, filled with shattered remnants of locations past, memories of regret-filled relationships, and powerful glowing balls that can change the course of conversation

PLAY A SURREAL BALL GAME

  • Overcome tactical challenges with perfect throws, shoot spirited trick shots and land sensational hits in turn-based sports-style encounters. As nights progress, Desta will become more experienced and attuned to this surreal world, discovering new abilities and ways to win

MEET POWERFUL FRIENDS

  • Brought to life with a full voice cast, Desta will meet all sorts of interesting and strange characters throughout their journey, all with exceptional abilities and powers, each with their own story to tell about their connection to this world

FIND YOUR INNER STRENGTH

  • As Desta and their friends fall deeper into the dream, uncover and level up brand new abilities that will completely flip encounters on their head

A PERSONAL STORY, DESIGNED FOR EVERYONE

  • From beginning to end, being approachable is a core value of all ustwo games. Desta: The Memories Between is designed for players of all skill levels to be able to experience the full journey



This game contains themes of self-reflection, anxiety, mental health, loss of parental figures and gender identity. Player discretion is advised.

ustwo games are proud independent developers, best known for the award-winning Monument Valley series, Land’s End, Assemble with Care and Alba: A Wildlife Adventure.
